{MUL}UDU.IDIM-MEŠ AN-e ša₂ a-na ma-mit LUGAL x x x x x x x x+x-tu₂ i-ra-ru-ma la i-tur-ru A₂.2-MEŠ-šu₂-un x+x-ši-ti DINGIR-ti be-lit-DINGIR-ME ina a-mat pi-i-šu₂ el-lit at-kal-ma i-na UD-mi-šu-ma ša₂ a-de-e šu-a-ti šu-uṣ-bu-tu um-ma LUGAL be-li₂ ma-mit iš-ku-nu it-ti ka-li KUR.KUR-MEŠ iš-me-e-ma NUN {d}AMAR.UTU a-na šu-pu-uš kiš-šu-tu₂ a-na KUR-aš-šur{KI} it-ru-uṣ bu-ni-šu₂ qa-at {1}AN.ŠAR₂-ba-an-DUMU.UŠ DUMU-LUGAL DUMU-LUGAL E₂-re-du-ti E₂-re-du-ti qa-at {1}{d}UTU-MU-GIN DUMU-LUGAL DUMU-LUGAL E₂-re-du-ti E₂-re-du-ti ša₂ KA₂.DINGIR.RA{KI} x+x ša₂ šu-lu-ku a-na e-peš LUGAL-ti iṣ-bat-ma x x x+x-a u {d}be-lit-DINGIR-MEŠ x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x x+x-bil-x+x DUMU-MEŠ {1}AN.ŠAR₂-ŠEŠ-SUM-na LUGAL kiš-ša₂-ti LUGAL kib-ra-a-ti er-bet-ti šu-nu x x x x-du qer-bu-uš-un o la ha-la-qu LUGAL-u₂-ti-šu-nu ku-un uš-še-e {GIŠ}GU.ZA-šu₂-nu šu-a-ti KUR.KUR-MEŠ nap-har-ši-na i-na ni-iš DINGIR-MEŠ GAL-MEŠ ma-mit u₂-ša₂-aṣ-bit-su-nu-ti i-na ni-iš aš-šur u {d}ši-EDIN-u₂-a DINGIR-ME E₂.ŠAR₂.RA ma-mit u₂-ša₂-aṣ-bit-su-nu-ti-ma ar₂-rat la nap-šur iš-ku-un i-na pi-i-šu₂-un i-na ni-iš {d}a-nu-um u₃ an-tum i-na ni-iš {d}EN.LIL₂ u₃ {d}NIN.LIL₂ i-na ni-iš {d}EN u {d}GAŠAN-ia x x i-na ni-iš 07 {MUL}UDU.IDIM-MEŠ AN-e ma-mit u₂-ša₂-aṣ-bit-su-nu-ti-ma ar₂-rat la nap-šur GAR-un ina pi-i-šu₂-un u₃ i-na mim-mu ši-pir E₂.GAL x x x ša₂ a-na mu-u₂-ti ha-x+x x x x u₂-na-si-su su-um-mi-iš x x man-nu ša-a-ša ša₂ a-na a-de-e šu-a-ti i-ha-ṭu-u₂ x+x x x x DINGIR-MEŠ GAL-MEŠ EN-MEŠ eš-re-e-ti li-ši-mu-šu ši-ma-ti ar-ra-ti ma-la i-na ŠA₃-bi a-de-e šu-a-ti šur-šu-du na-x x x NIG₂.GIG ša₂ du-ur UD-me li-x x x za-mar la i-x x x AN.ŠAR₂ a-gu-um {d}a-num an-tum li-man-nu-šu a-na ŠU.2 LUGAL-šu lu GAR-niš-šu u₂-x x x GIR₂.AN.BAR-šu₂ lik-šu-ud-su {d}ši-EDIN-u₂-a be-lit DINGIR-ME GAL-ti x x x li-kar-ru x+x x x {d}a-num u₃ an-tum an-na-šu x x la i-DU₈ x x x {d}EN.LIL₂ u₃ {d}NIN.LIL₂ x x x a-na le-mu-ut-ti x x x {d}AMAR.UTU u₃ {d}zar-pa-ni-tu x x te-bi x x x x x x x x x+x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x ša₂ a-x x x x x x a-a-ši LUGAL ša₂ EN GAL-u₂ {d}AMAR.UTU ki-niš u₂-ma-ʾi-ir-an-ni-ma x x x x x+x x um-ma aš₂-šu₂ ru-qiš ta-x x x la ta-tur-ru aš₂-ru-uk-ku-nu x x {d}EN GAL-u₂ {d}AMAR.UTU a-na ti-x x x x x x+x-su-ku-nu-ši-ma iš-ku-un x+x x x x x x x+x-na i-na ku-un ŠA₃-bi ki-ni-iš x x x x x+x-x-ku-nu-šim-ma mug-ra qi₂-bi-ti x x x x dam-qa-a-ti {MUL}NIN.MAH x x x x x x+x e hi ṣa ti kiš-šu-ti x x x x x x-ti DINGIR-ti {d}be-lit-DINGIR-MEŠ x x x x x x ta-na-da-at a-me-lut-ti x x x x x x+x BALA-u₂ ta-nam-din-nu {1}{d}x+x x x x
